text: The 4th Beijing College Student Film Festival () was held in 1997 in Beijing, China. ==Awards== * Best Film Award: The Day the Sun Turned Cold, On the Beat * Best Actor Award: Zhu Xu for The King of Masks * Best Actress Award: Ning Jing for The Bewitching Braid * Best Visual Effects Award: The Sorrow of Brook Steppe * Best First Film Award: Huo Jianqi - Winner * Artistic Exploration Award: Love Talk * Committee Special Award: The King of Masks * Special Recognition Award: Xie Jin ==References== ==External links== Category:Beijing College Student Film Festival Category:1997 film festivals Category:1997 festivals in Asia Bei
title: 4th Beijing College Student Film Festival
